definition.value: Click here to provide comments or special instructions for this order

Errors have occured during the process of your form.

Please make the following corrections:
This form has already been submitted. Please press Ok and wait for this process to be completed.

This is a default setup of the Loaded Commerce eCommerce shopping cart solution, products shown are for demonstrational purposes, any products purchased will not be delivered nor will the customer be billed. Any information seen on these products is to be treated as fictional.
There are no products available in this category.
Welcome! Sign in and see what's new since your last visit.
Welcome back %s! Take a look at what is new since your last visit!
Please correct the error(s) with highlighted field(s) and try again.
Creating an account allows you to complete your order, checkout faster, review your order history and much more.
I am a returning customer and already have an account here.
There was no match for the e-mail address and/or password. Please try again.

You have sign out successfully from your account. Your shopping cart has been saved and will be restored the next time you sign on again.

It is now safe to leave this site.
View or change my account information.
View or change entries in my address book.
View the orders I have made.
View and change my product notifications list.
You have not made any purchases yet.
Including store news, new products, special offers, and other promotional announcements.

The product notification list allows you to stay up to date on products you find of interest.

To be up to date on all product changes, select Global Product Notifications.
Recieve notifications on all available products.
To remove a product notification, clear the products checkbox and click on Continue.

There are currently no products marked to be notified on.

To add products to your product notification list, click on the notification link available on the detailed product information page.

This address is used as the pre-selected shipping and billing address for orders placed on this store.

This address is also used as the base for product and service tax calculations.
NOTE: A maximum of %s address book entries allowed.
Are you sure you would like to delete the selected address from your address book?
Please acknowledge you agree with our privacy statement by ticking the checkbox.
I have read and agreed to your privacy statement (here).
If you've forgotten your password, enter your e-mail address below and we'll send you an e-mail message containing your new password.

We welcome you to %s!
You can now take part in the various services we have on offer for you. Some of these services include:
<li>Permanent Cart - Any products added to your online cart remain there until you remove them, or check them out. <li>Address Book - We can now deliver your products to another address other than yours! This is perfect to send birthday gifts direct to the birthday-person themselves. <li>Order History - View your history of purchases that you have made with us. <li>Products Reviews - Share your opinions on products with our other customers.
For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %s.
Note: This email address was given to us by one of our customers. If you did not signup to be a member, please send an email to the store owner.

A new password was requested from %s.
Your new password to %s is:
%s
For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %s.
Note: If you did not request this action via our password forgotten page, please notify the store owner as soon as possible.

Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created! You can now take advantage of member privileges to enhance your online shopping experience with us. If you have any questions about the operation of this online shop, please email the store owner.

A confirmation has been sent to the provided email address. If you have not received it within the hour, please contact us.
Your account has been successfully updated!
Your account password has been successfully updated!
Your newsletter subscriptions have been successfully updated!
Your product notifications have been successfully updated!
The selected address has been successfully removed from your address book.
Your address book has been successfully updated.
Success: A new password has been sent to your e-mail address.
The primary address cannot be deleted. Please set another address as the primary address and try again.
Your current password does not match our records. Please try again.
The address book entry does not exist.
Your address book is full. Please delete an unneeded address to save a new one.
Error: The E-Mail Address was not found in our records, please try again.
Installation directory exists at: %s. Please remove this directory for security reasons.
I am able to write to the configuration file: %s. This is a potential security risk - please set the right user permissions on this file.
The sessions directory does not exist: %s. Sessions will not work until this directory is created.
I am not able to write to the sessions directory: %s. Sessions will not work until the right user permissions are set.
session.auto_start is enabled - please disable this php feature in php.ini and restart the web server.
The downloadable products directory does not exist: %s. Downloadable products will not work until this directory is valid.
Thank you! Your order is complete.
You will be able to apply coupon code on the confirmation page.
Please choose from your address book where you would like the items to be delivered to.
This is the currently selected shipping address where the items in this order will be delivered to.
Please select the preferred shipping method to use on this order.
This is currently the only shipping method available to use on this order.
Add A Note To This Order
Please select the preferred shipping address if the items in this order are to be delivered elsewhere.
Please select the preferred billing address if the invoice to this order is to be delivered elsewhere.
Please use the following form to create a new shipping address to use for this order.
Please use the following form to create a new billing address to use for this order.
This is the currently selected billing address where the invoice to this order will be delivered to.
Please choose from your address book where you would like the invoice to be sent to.
to select the preferred shipping method.
to select the preferred payment method.

Products marked with %s don't exist in desired quantity in our stock.
Please change the quantity of the marked products.

Products marked with %s don't exist in desired quantity in our stock.
You can buy them anyway and check the quantity we have in stock for immediate delivery in the checkout process.
Please acknowledge the terms and conditions bound to this order by ticking the following box. The terms and conditions can be read here.
I agree to the terms and conditions
Please select the preferred payment method to use on this order.
This is currently the only payment method available to use on this order.
This is also my billable address
Your order has been successfully processed! Your products will arrive at their destination within 2-5 working days.
Please notify me of updates to the products I have selected below:
You can view your order history by going to the My Account page and by clicking on History.
Please direct any questions you have to the store owner.
Thanks for shopping with us online!
You can also download your products at a later time at %s

We have detected that your browser does not support cookies, or has set cookies to be disabled.

To continue shopping online, we encourage you to enable cookies on your browser.

For Internet Explorer browsers, please follow these instructions:
  1. Click on the Tools menubar, and select Internet Options
  2. Select the Security tab, and reset the security level to Medium
We have taken this measurement of security for your benefit, and apologize upfront if any inconveniences are caused.

Please contact the store owner if you have any questions relating to this requirement, or to continue purchasing products offline.

We have detected that your browser does not support cookies, or has set cookies to be disabled.

To continue shopping online, we encourage you to enable cookies on your browser.

For Internet Explorer browsers, please follow these instructions:
  1. Click on the Tools menubar, and select Internet Options
  2. Select the Security tab, and reset the security level to Medium
We have taken this measurement of security for your benefit, and apologize upfront if any inconveniences are caused.

Please contact the store owner if you have any questions relating to this requirement, or to continue purchasing products offline.

We have detected that your browser has generated a different SSL Session ID used throughout our secure pages.

For security measures you will need to logon to your account again to continue shopping online.

Certain older browsers do not have the capability of generating a secure SSL Session ID automatically which we require. If you use such a browser, we recommend switching to another browser such as Microsoft Internet Explorer, Firefox, or Opera to continue your online shopping experience.

We have taken this measurement of security for your benefit, and apologize upfront if any inconveniences are caused.

Please contact the store owner if you have any questions relating to this requirement, or to continue purchasing products offline.
Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner.

Cookies must be enabled to purchase online on this store to embrace privacy and security related issues regarding your visit to this site.

By enabling cookie support on your browser, the communication between you and this site is strengthened to be certain it is you who are making transactions on your own behalf, and to prevent leakage of your privacy information.

We validate the SSL Session ID automatically generated by your browser on every secure page request made to this server.

This validation assures that it is you who is navigating on this site with your account and not somebody else.
Not available in this combination. Please select another combination for your order.
There are currently no specials available.
There are currently no products available.
For more information, please visit this products webpage.

Thank you for your review! It has been received and is now active!
Thank you for your review! It has been received and is pending for approval.
Your email about %s has been successfully sent to %s.
Error: Your friends name must not be empty.
Error: Your friends e-mail address must be a valid e-mail address.
Error: Your name must not be empty.
Error: Your e-mail address must be a valid e-mail address.

Keywords may be separated by AND and/or OR statements for greater control of the search results.

For example, Microsoft AND mouse would generate a result set that contain both words. However, for mouse OR keyboard, the result set returned would contain both or either words.

Exact matches can be searched for by enclosing keywords in double-quotes.

For example, "notebook computer" would generate a result set which match the exact string.

Brackets can be used for further control on the result set.

For example, Microsoft and (keyboard or mouse or "visual basic").
At least one of the fields in the search form must be entered.
To Date must be greater than or equal to From Date.
Price From must be a number.
Price To must be a number.
Price To must be greater than or equal to Price From.
* The Review Text must have at least %s characters.
* You must rate the product for your review.
* Please select a payment method for your order.
Please select a payment method for your order.
Please confirm the terms and conditions bound to this order.
Please confirm the privacy statement by ticking the box below.
Your First Name must contain a minimum of %s characters.
Your Last Name must contain a minimum of %s characters.
Your Date of Birth must be set correctly.
Your E-Mail Address must contain a minimum of %S characters.
Your E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid - please make any necessary corrections.
Your E-Mail Address already exists in our records - please log in with the e-mail address or create an account with a different address.

Your Fax Number must contain a minium of %s characters.
Your Password must contain a minimum of %s characters.
The Password Confirmation must match your Password.
Your Password must contain a minimum of %s characters.
Your new Password must contain a minimum of %s characters.
The Password Confirmation must match your new Password.

For security measures you will need to logon to your account again to continue shopping online.

Certain older browsers do not have the capability of generating a secure SSL Session ID automatically which we require. If you use such a browser, we recommend switching to another browser such as Microsoft Internet Explorer, Firefox, or Opera to continue your online shopping experience.

We have taken this measurement of security for your benefit, and apologize upfront if any inconveniences are caused.
